grow_event_M1_type_rock/3901_1301_0100_1:
Hah!
I’ll be waiting for you to get stronger and
challenge me again!
grow_event_M1_type_rock/3902_1031_0100_1:
I want a blazing battle
with a burning Trainer.
grow_event_M1_type_rock/3902_1301_0100_1:
You want to challenge me after you train under
Shauntal? Very good! I’ll be ready for you!
grow_event_M1_type_rock/3903_1031_0100_1:
“And so she waited...
for a battle to light
the fire within.”
grow_event_M1_type_rock/3903_1301_0100_1:
“The time has come to learn about stone...”
Come on. Let’s do some rock-solid training
and prepare to challenge Blaine!
